title: nf-core/oceangenomesmitogenomes pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be a non-empty string without whitespace
sample.description: Sample identifier (any non-empty string without spaces)

fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'
fastq_1.description: Full path to FastQ file for Illumina short reads 1. File has to be gzipped and have the extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'.

fastq_2.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 2 cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'
fastq_2.description: Full path to FastQ file for Illumina short reads 2. File has to be gzipped and have the extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'.

sequencing_type.errorMessage: Sequencing type must be one of: hic, hifi, or ilmn
sequencing_type.description: Type of sequencing technology used: hic (Hi-C), hifi (PacBio HiFi), or ilmn (Illumina)

single_end.description: Whether the sample is single-end (true) or paired-end (false)

original_id.description: Original sample identifier before any cleaning or normalization

completion_date.description: HiFi completion date parsed from filename (YYMMDD)

date.description: Sequencing date derived from filename or database (YYMMDD)

assembly_prefix.description: Assembly prefix derived from sample id, sequencing type, and date

nominal_species_id.description: Nominal species identifier from the sample table

invertebrates.description: Whether the sample is an invertebrate (true/false)
